source:
%%sql
-- Build CostCenter_Dim table  

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim (
    CostCenterID,
    CostCenterCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (Order by T1.Cost_Ctr NULLS FIRST) AS CostCenterID,
    T1.Cost_Ctr AS CostCenterCode,
    First(T1.Cost_Centre) AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Cost_Ctr,'.'), IFNULL(first(T1.Cost_Centre),'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Cost_Ctr
